verses.text: <a href="../1-Timothy-4-1/" title="1 Timothy 4:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils;
<a href="../1-Timothy-4-2/" title="1 Timothy 4:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"Speaking lies in hypocrisy; having their conscience seared with a hot iron;
3 "JESUS_END"Forbidding to marry, and commanding to abstain from meats, which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth.
4 "JESUS_END"For every creature of God is good, and nothing to be refused, if it be received with thanksgiving:
<a href="../1-Timothy-4-5/" title="1 Timothy 4:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer.

<a href="../1-Timothy-4-6/" title="1 Timothy 4:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things, thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ, nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine, whereunto thou hast attained.
7 "JESUS_END"But refuse profane and old wives' fables, and exercise thyself rather unto godliness.

<a href="../1-Timothy-4-8/" title="1 Timothy 4:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"For bodily exercise profiteth little: but godliness is profitable unto all things, having promise of the life that now is, and of that which is to come.
9 "JESUS_END"This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation.

<a href="../1-Timothy-4-10/" title="1 Timothy 4:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10  "JESUS_END"For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach, because we trust in the living God, who is the Saviour of all men, specially of those that believe.
<a href="../1-Timothy-4-11/" title="1 Timothy 4:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"These things command and teach.

<a href="../1-Timothy-4-12/" title="1 Timothy 4:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"Let no man despise thy youth; but be thou an example of the believers, in word, in conversation, in charity, in spirit, in faith, in purity.
<a href="../1-Timothy-4-13/" title="1 Timothy 4:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13  "JESUS_END"Till I come, give attendance to reading, to exhortation, to doctrine.

<a href="../1-Timothy-4-14/" title="1 Timothy 4:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14  "JESUS_END"Neglect not the gift that is in thee, which was given thee by prophecy, with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery.

<a href="../1-Timothy-4-15/" title="1 Timothy 4:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"Meditate upon these things; give thyself wholly to them; that thy profiting may appear to all.

<a href="../1-Timothy-4-16/" title="1 Timothy 4:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16  "JESUS_END"Take heed unto thyself, and unto the doctrine; continue in them: for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself, and them that hear thee.
